original: mos pas spyod pa can gang zhe na /
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa can gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who practices with will?

original: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la bzod pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la bzod pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: The person who is endowed with the small, middling, and great patience of the stage of action in faith is a bodhisattva.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas spyod pa can gang zhe na /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas spyod pa can gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who practices with superior intention?

original: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
analyzed: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
translated: The person who is on the ten bodhisattva stages.

original: mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod pa can gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod pa can gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who practices with signs?

original: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can dang / shin tu sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
analyzed: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can dang / shin tu sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
translated: The person who is on the bodhisattva stages of the Joyous, the Stainless, the Radiant, the Brilliant, the Hard-to-conquer, and the Realized.

original: mtshan ma med par spyod pa can gyi gang zag gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan ma med par spyod pa can gyi gang zag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who practices without signs?

original: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
analyzed: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
translated: The person who is on the bodhisattva stage of Far-reaching.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med par spyod pa can gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med par spyod pa can gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who practices without deliberate effort?

original: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
analyzed: gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i gang zag go //
translated: The person who is on the stage of the Bodhisattva called Immovable, Good Intelligence, or Cloud of Dharma.

original: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i gang zag ces gang gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i gang zag ces gang gsungs pa la /
translated: The person who is a Stream-Winner.

original: rgyun tu zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: rgyun tu zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of Stream-Winners:

original: rim gyis pa dang / cig car nges par 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: rim gyis pa dang / cig car nges par 'byin pa'o //
translated: those who are gradually freed from the defilements, and those who are freed suddenly.

original: rim gyi pa ni ji skad bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rim gyi pa ni ji skad bstan pa yin no //
translated: The gradual type is as already described.

original: cig car nges par 'byin pa ni gang bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs par byas nas /
analyzed: cig car nges par 'byin pa ni gang bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs par byas nas /
translated: The sudden type is one who, having realized the Truths,

original: mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te /
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te /
translated: and having relied on the stage called ‚Äúwithout pause,‚Äù

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis /
translated: by the supramundane path,

original: khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rnam pas cig car spong ste /
analyzed: khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rnam pas cig car spong ste /
translated: simultaneously abandons the defilements of the three realms.

original: 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu @110b dang ; 'bras bu gnyis la gdags so //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu @110b dang ; 'bras bu gnyis la gdags so //
translated: This person is designated as having two fruits: the fruit of Stream-Winner and the fruit of Arhat.

original: phal cher ni mthong ba'i chos sam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe kun shes pa thob par byed do //
analyzed: phal cher ni mthong ba'i chos sam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe kun shes pa thob par byed do //
translated: For the most part, he attains the fruit of ‚Äúhaving attained complete knowledge‚Äù in this life or at the time of death.

original: gal te mi byed na yang de smon lam gyi stobs can yin te /
analyzed: gal te mi byed na yang de smon lam gyi stobs can yin te /
translated: If he does not enter the womb, he is endowed with the power of prayer.

original: smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams nyid du skye ste /
analyzed: smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams nyid du skye ste /
translated: By the power of his prayer, he is reborn in the desire realm.

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na rang rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na rang rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a Buddha has not appeared, he becomes a Solitary Buddha.

original: mngon par rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the definition of realization?

original: mngon par rtogs pa bcu ste /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa bcu ste /
translated: There are ten realizations:

original: chos mngon par rtogs pa dang / don mngon par rtogs pa dang / de kho na mngon par rtogs pa dang / rjes la mngon par rtogs pa dang / dkon mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang / kun tu mi 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: chos mngon par rtogs pa dang / don mngon par rtogs pa dang / de kho na mngon par rtogs pa dang / rjes la mngon par rtogs pa dang / dkon mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang / kun tu mi 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa dang /
translated: realization of the teaching, realization of the meaning, realization of reality, subsequent realization, realization of the Jewels, realization of the unarisen,

original: mthar thug pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: realization of the ultimate, realization of the Sravaka, realization of the Pratyekabuddha, and realization of the Bodhisattva.

original: chos mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is realization of the teaching?

original: bden pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos rnams la mos pa dang / dad pa chen po thob pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos rnams la mos pa dang / dad pa chen po thob pa'o //
translated: It is the acquisition of a great faith and a great aspiration with regard to the factors of existence which are the object of the truths.

original: don mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /üîΩnges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs na bden pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos rnams kho na la /
analyzed: don mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs na bden pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos rnams kho na la /
translated: What is the clear understanding of the meaning?

original: bden pa la chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa chen po thob pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa la chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa chen po thob pa ste /
translated: It is the acquisition of the great acquiescence in the Dharma which consists in reflecting on the truths with regard to the factors of existence which are the object of the truths, in the state of the aids to penetration.

original: bzod pa de yang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i chen 'bring po dang / chen po'i chen po dang / rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: bzod pa de yang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i chen 'bring po dang / chen po'i chen po dang / rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: This acquiescence is distinguished by three kinds of great reflection on the truths, namely, the small of the great, the middling of the great and the great of the great.

original: de kho na mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de kho na mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the clear understanding of reality?

original: gang mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bcu drug po dag thob pa'o //
analyzed: gang mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bcu drug po dag thob pa'o //
translated: It is the acquisition of the sixteen thought-moments of the path of vision.

original: mthong ba'i lam la ni bden pa rnam par 'jog pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba kun rdzob shes pa rnams 'thob ste /
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam la ni bden pa rnam par 'jog pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba kun rdzob shes pa rnams 'thob ste /
translated: On the path of vision, one acquires conventional cognition which arises from the end of the clear understanding of the establishment of the truths.

original: mngon du byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in the state of realization.

original: de dag ni bsgom pa'i lam la mngon du byed do //
analyzed: de dag ni bsgom pa'i lam la mngon du byed do //
translated: They are realized in the path of cultivation.

original: rjes la mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rjes la mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is realization through the subsequent state?

original: bsgom pa'i lam thams cad do //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam thams cad do //
translated: It is the whole path of cultivation.

original: dkon mchog mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /üîΩsangs rgyas la shes nas @111a * //
analyzed: dkon mchog mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na / sangs rgyas la shes nas @111a * //
translated: What is realization through the Jewels?üîΩIt is faith through conviction in the Buddha,

original: dad pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa'o //
translated: in the Dharma, and in the Sangha.

original: kun tu mi 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: kun tu mi 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is realization through the absence of appearance?

original: mi bya ba'i sdom pa gang thob pas slob pa 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: mi bya ba'i sdom pa gang thob pas slob pa 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: It is the vow of abstention which is acquired by the candidate who thinks:

original: bdag gi sems can dmyal ba zad do //üîΩdud 'gro zad do //üîΩyi dags zad do //
analyzed: bdag gi sems can dmyal ba zad do // dud 'gro zad do // yi dags zad do //
translated: ‚ÄúMy hellish states are exhausted.üîΩMy animal states are exhausted.

original: ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba zad do //
analyzed: ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba zad do //
translated: My states of the king of the dead are exhausted.

original: bdag yang ngan song ba'i las byas nas ngan song rnams su rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa'i skal pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag yang ngan song ba'i las byas nas ngan song rnams su rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa'i skal pa can ma yin no //
translated: I am not destined to realize the results of actions which should be requited in the unhappy destinies, even if I have committed actions which should be requited there.üîΩ‚Äù

original: snyam pa'o // mthar thug pa mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na ;
analyzed: snyam pa'o // mthar thug pa mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na ;
translated: What is realization through the ultimate?

original: ji ltar lam gyi bden pa la mthar phyin pa'i lam bstan pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar lam gyi bden pa la mthar phyin pa'i lam bstan pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the truth of the path is taught as the path of culmination.

original: nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the Sravaka's clear realization?

original: mngon par rtogs pa bdun po de dag nyid mdor bsdus te /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa bdun po de dag nyid mdor bsdus te /
translated: It is the seven clear realizations themselves, in brief.

original: nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the Sravaka's clear realization.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the Pratyekabuddha's clear realization?üîΩIt is the seven clear realizations themselves, attained without relying on the words of another.

original: mngon par rtogs pa bdun po de dag nyid gzhan gyi sgra la ma brten par thob pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa bdun po de dag nyid gzhan gyi sgra la ma brten par thob pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the Pratyekabuddha's clear realization.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the Bodhisattva's clear realization?

original: mngon par rtogs pa bdun po de dag nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa bdun po de dag nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the acceptance of the certainty of the attainment of enlightenment with regard to the seven clear realizations themselves,

original: mngon du byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but not their realization.

original: yangs rab tu dga' ba la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yangs rab tu dga' ba la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The entry of the bodhisattva into the faultlessness of the bodhisattva stage is called the clear knowledge of the bodhisattva.

original: nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa las byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi mngon par rtogs pa las byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between the clear knowledge of the bodhisattva and the clear knowledge of the sravaka?

original: dmigs pa'i khyad par dang / nye bar rton pa'i khyad par dang / rab tu rtogs pa'i khyad par dang / khas len pa'i khyad par dang / nges par 'byung ba'i khyad par dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par dang / gnas dang g-yog 'khor gyi khyad par dang /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i khyad par dang / nye bar rton pa'i khyad par dang / rab tu rtogs pa'i khyad par dang / khas len pa'i khyad par dang / nges par 'byung ba'i khyad par dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par dang / gnas dang g-yog 'khor gyi khyad par dang /
translated: The difference is in the object, in the support, in the clear knowledge, in the vow, in the deliverance, in the possession, in the abode and retinue,

original: btsun par skye ba'i khyad par dang / skye ba'i khyad par dang / 'bras bu'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: btsun par skye ba'i khyad par dang / skye ba'i khyad par dang / 'bras bu'i khyad par ro //
translated: in the birth of nobility, in the birth, and in the result.

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par ni gnas gyur ba'i khyad par dang / yon @111b tan phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par dang / rnam pa lnga'i khyad par dang / sku gsum gyi khyad par dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khyad par dang / 'dres shing nye bar 'dres pa'i ye shes kyi nus pa thob pa'i khyad par dang /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par ni gnas gyur ba'i khyad par dang / yon @111b tan phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par dang / rnam pa lnga'i khyad par dang / sku gsum gyi khyad par dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khyad par dang / 'dres shing nye bar 'dres pa'i ye shes kyi nus pa thob pa'i khyad par dang /
translated: The distinctive result should be understood in terms of the distinctive transformation, the distinctive excellence of qualities, the distinctive five aspects, the distinctive three bodies, the distinctive transcendence of suffering, the distinctive attainment of the power of integrated and fully integrated pristine wisdom,

original: sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dang ; 'dres pa dang nye bar 'dres pa'i las byed pa'i khyad par dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa'i thabs kyi khyad par dang / yongs su skyob pa rnam pa lnga'i khyad par gyis kyang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dang ; 'dres pa dang nye bar 'dres pa'i las byed pa'i khyad par dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa'i thabs kyi khyad par dang / yongs su skyob pa rnam pa lnga'i khyad par gyis kyang rig par bya'o //
translated: the distinctive purification of obscurations, the distinctive performance of integrated and fully integrated activities, the distinctive means of demonstrating manifest perfect enlightenment and transcendence of suffering, and the distinctive five kinds of protection.

original: tshad med pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can 'di dag mngon par rtogs pa gang gis bsdus she na /
analyzed: tshad med pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can 'di dag mngon par rtogs pa gang gis bsdus she na /
translated: In which realizations are these distinctive qualities such as the immeasurables subsumed?

original: rjes la mngon par rtogs pa dang / mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pas bsdus so //üîΩde dag kyang tshad med pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / bsams nas shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rjes la mngon par rtogs pa dang / mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pas bsdus so // de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / bsams nas shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: The subsequent realization is included in the final realization.üîΩThose are included in the immeasurables, liberations, subjugating bases, bases of totality, absence of conflict, knowledge through resolve, and the correct and discerning awarenesses.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / yongs su dag pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / bsrung ba med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / yongs su dag pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / bsrung ba med pa rnams dang /
translated: They are also included in the superknowledges, the major and minor marks, the purities, the powers, the fearlessnesses, the establishments of mindfulness, and the forms of protection.

original: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / bag chags legs par bcom pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mdo sde las ji skad 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / bag chags legs par bcom pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mdo sde las ji skad 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: the unforgetting nature, the complete destruction of the propensities, great compassion, the eighteen attributes exclusive to a Buddha, and the knowledge of all the aspects.

original: byams pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: byams pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is love?

original: bsam gtan la brten te sems can rnams la phan pa dang phrad par shog shig par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: bsam gtan la brten te sems can rnams la phan pa dang phrad par shog shig par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, aiming at the happiness of beings, and consisting of the accomplishment of the state of loving kindness.

original: snying rje gang zhe na /üîΩsems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang bral bar shog shig par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang @112a * //
analyzed: snying rje gang zhe na / sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang bral bar shog shig par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang @112a * //
translated: What is compassion?

original: dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, aiming at the deliverance from suffering of beings, and consisting of the accomplishment of the state of compassion.

original: dga' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dga' ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is joy?

original: sems can rnams la bde ba dang mi 'bral bar shog shig par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sems can rnams la bde ba dang mi 'bral bar shog shig par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The attainment of the station of the mind that is directed to the thought May all beings be endowed with happiness and not be separated from happiness is the same as before.

original: btang snyoms gang zhe na /
analyzed: btang snyoms gang zhe na /
translated: What is equanimity?

original: bsam gtan la brtan te sems can rnams la phan par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan la brtan te sems can rnams la phan par bsam pa'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The attainment of the station of the mind that is directed to the thought May all beings be free from sorrow is the same as before.

original: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the contemplation of the form-possessor regarding forms?

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩsprul pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan la brten te ;üîΩlta ba po bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang ma bral ba'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / sprul pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan la brten te ; lta ba po bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang ma bral ba'am /
translated: It is as follows:üîΩThe contemplation of the form-possessor regarding forms is the attainment of the station of the mind that is directed to the thought May all beings be free from sorrow by relying on the absorptions.

original: gzhag pas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gzhag pas kyang rung ste /
translated: The contemplation of the form-possessor regarding forms is the attainment of the station of the mind that is directed to the thought May all beings be free from sorrow by relying on the absorptions.üîΩThe contemplation of the form-possessor regarding forms is the attainment of the station of the mind that is directed to the thought May all beings be free from sorrow by relying on the absorptions.

original: snang ba'i gzugs rnams la lta ba'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: snang ba'i gzugs rnams la lta ba'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is the concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, in the accomplishment of the station of viewing the forms of the external realm that appear as objects of the eye sense faculty.

original: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩlta ba po bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang bral ba'am /
analyzed: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba ji lta bu zhe na / lta ba po bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang bral ba'am /
translated: What is the station of viewing external forms while having the perception of internal formlessness?

original: gzugs med pa'i 'du shes gzhag pas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i 'du shes gzhag pas kyang rung ste /
translated: It is the station of viewing external forms while having the perception of formlessness, or the station of viewing external forms while having the perception of the body.

original: snang ba'i gzugs rnams la lta ba'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i gzugs rnams la lta ba'i gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is the concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, in the accomplishment of the station of viewing the forms of the external realm that appear as objects of the eye sense faculty.

original: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩ'di lta ste /
translated: What is the liberation of the beautiful, having attained and remained in it by means of the body?üîΩIt is the concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, in the accomplishment of the liberation of the beautiful.

original: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir rang gis sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i gzugs rnams la phan tshun ltos pa'i 'du shes dang / phan tshun rjes su 'brel ba'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir rang gis sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i gzugs rnams la phan tshun ltos pa'i 'du shes dang / phan tshun rjes su 'brel ba'i 'du shes dang /
translated: In order to be liberated from the obscurations that arise from the afflictions with regard to the pleasant and the unpleasant, one attains the perception of mutual dependence, the perception of mutual connection, and the perception of mutual oneness with regard to pleasant and unpleasant forms.

original: phan tshun ro gcig pa'i 'du shes thob nas de la gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phan tshun ro gcig pa'i 'du shes thob nas de la gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Abiding in that, it is the correct attainment of the liberation of the sphere of infinite space.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the liberation of the sphere of infinite space?

original: thar pa'i rjes su mthun pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: thar pa'i rjes su mthun pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is the correct attainment of the sphere of infinite space, which is in conformity with liberation.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ji lta bar @112b rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ji lta bar @112b rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
translated: The liberations of the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception should be understood in the same way as the liberation of the sphere of infinite space.

original: 'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa la chags pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa la chags pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In this way, in order to be liberated from the obscurations of attachment to the peaceful liberations.

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the liberation of the cessation of perception and feeling?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa la brten te /
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa la brten te /
translated: In order to be liberated from the obscurations to the cessation of perception and feeling, one relies on the liberation of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa las yang dag par 'das nas thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i gang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa las yang dag par 'das nas thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i gang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'gog pa'o //
translated: It is the cessation of mind and mental activities, having transcended the stage of the happy abodes and not having attained the stage of the happy abodes, and being endowed with the attainment of the stage that is favorable to liberation.

original: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi ni rnam par thar pa gnyis kyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi ni rnam par thar pa gnyis kyis rig par bya'o //
translated: The four spheres of mastery should be understood according to the two liberations.

original: bzhi ni rnam par thar pa gcig gis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi ni rnam par thar pa gcig gis rig par bya'o //
translated: Four are to be understood according to one liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ni dmigs pa la mos par byad do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ni dmigs pa la mos par byad do //
translated: The liberations cause one to be inclined toward the object.

original: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyis ni dbang byed pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyis ni dbang byed pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon to //
translated: The spheres of mastery cause one to overpower the object.

original: sems can dang sems can ma yin par gtogs pa'i gzugs rnams ni chung ngu dang chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems can dang sems can ma yin par gtogs pa'i gzugs rnams ni chung ngu dang chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: The forms belonging to sentient beings and not belonging to sentient beings are called small and great.

original: mi'i dang lha'i rnams ni ngan pa dang bzang po rnams so //
analyzed: mi'i dang lha'i rnams ni ngan pa dang bzang po rnams so //
translated: Those belonging to humans and gods are called inferior and superior.

original: lhag ma ni rnam par thar pa las 'byung ba ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rnam par thar pa las 'byung ba ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as in the case of the liberations.üîΩThe eight spheres of totality are: earth, water, fire, wind, blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyis dmigs pa zil gyis mnan nas zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis zad par rgyas par byed par gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni zad par gyi skye mched ces bya'o //
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyis dmigs pa zil gyis mnan nas zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis zad par rgyas par byed par gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni zad par gyi skye mched ces bya'o //
translated: The concentrations and wisdoms, together with the mind and mental factors associated with them, are called the bases of mastery because they are the bases for mastery.

original: ci'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched rnams las la sogs pa zad par gdags she na /üîΩgnas dang bcas pa'i gzugs la khyab par bya ba 'byor ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched rnams las la sogs pa zad par gdags she na / gnas dang bcas pa'i gzugs la khyab par bya ba 'byor ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Why are the bases of mastery taught separately from the powers?üîΩThe powers are taught in terms of the ability to manifest the realization of the truths, while the bases of mastery are taught in terms of the ability to manifest the realization of the truths and to manifest the mastery over meditative development.

original: lhag ma ni rnam par thar pa bzhin du ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyor ro //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rnam par thar pa bzhin du ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyor ro //
translated: The remaining should be connected in the same way as the liberations.

original: zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis ni rnam par thar pa rnams 'grub par byed do //üîΩnyon mongs pa med @113a * //
analyzed: zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis ni rnam par thar pa rnams 'grub par byed do // nyon mongs pa med @113a * //
translated: The bases of mastery are accomplished by means of the bases of totality.

original: pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the absence of conflict?

original: bsam gtan la brten te gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa 'byung ba rjes su bsrung bar gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: bsam gtan la brten te gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa 'byung ba rjes su bsrung bar gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, which are applied to the protection of others from the arising of defilement.

original: bsams nas shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsams nas shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is knowledge through resolve?

original: bsam gtan la brten te 'di shes par bya'o zhes bsams nas yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan la brten te 'di shes par bya'o zhes bsams nas yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, which are applied to the knowledge of what is to be known through resolve.

original: chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the analytical knowledge of the Teaching?

original: bsam gtan la brten nas rnam grangs su gtogs pa rnams la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan la brten nas rnam grangs su gtogs pa rnams la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, which are applied to the knowledge of the enumeration of the Teaching.üîΩWhat is the analytical knowledge of the Teaching?üîΩIt is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, which are applied to the knowledge of the characteristics of the Teaching.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /üîΩmtshan nyid dang dgongs pa la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /üîΩmtshan nyid dang dgongs pa la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: What is the analytical knowledge of the explanation?üîΩIt is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, which are applied to the knowledge of the intention of the Teaching.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the analytical knowledge of the teaching?

original: yul mi'i skad dang chos kyi nges pa'i tshig la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: yul mi'i skad dang chos kyi nges pa'i tshig la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is the application of the knowledge of the teaching which consists of the unhindered knowledge of the language of the country and of the Dharma.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the analytical knowledge of inspired speech?

original: chos rab tu dbye ba la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: chos rab tu dbye ba la thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is the application of the knowledge of inspired speech which consists of the unhindered knowledge of the exposition of the Dharma.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the superknowledge of supernormal power?

original: bsam gtan la brten nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: bsam gtan la brten nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is concentration and wisdom, and the mind and mental activities associated with them, based on absorption, which consists of the application of the knowledge of the achievement of various kinds of supernormal power.

original: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the superknowledge of the divine ear?

original: sgra sna tshogs nyan pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra sna tshogs nyan pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The superknowledge of the various kinds of hearing is the mastery of the power of hearing various sounds.

original: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the superknowledge of the knowledge of the mind of another?

original: sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is the mastery of the power of penetrating the thoughts of other beings.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the superknowledge of the recollection of former abodes?

original: sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rjes su dran pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rjes su dran pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is the mastery of the power of recollecting former abodes.

original: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /

original: bsams nas shes pas las ci mdzad ce na /

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
