analyzed: lus kyi las kyis bstan pa la 'dun par mdzad do //
translated: By the action of the body, he attracts beings to himself.

original: ngag gi las kyis 'dun par mdzad do //
analyzed: ngag gi las kyis 'dun par mdzad do //
translated: By the action of speech, he attracts them.

original: sems kun brjod pas kyang 'dun par mdzad do //
analyzed: sems kun brjod pas kyang 'dun par mdzad do //
translated: By the action of the mind, he attracts them.

original: sems can gyi spyod pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mkhyen pas sems can rnams @115b nges par 'byung ba la ji lta ba bzhin du 'doms so //
analyzed: sems can gyi spyod pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mkhyen pas sems can rnams @115b nges par 'byung ba la ji lta ba bzhin du 'doms so //
translated: By the knowledge of the destinies of beings, he instructs them in the way of renunciation.

original: mtshan nyid dpe byed bzang po rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dpe byed bzang po rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What is the action of the excellent marks?

original: mthong ma thag tu skyes bu chen po nyid du yid ces par mdzad do //
analyzed: mthong ma thag tu skyes bu chen po nyid du yid ces par mdzad do //
translated: By the mere sight of them, he inspires great faith.

original: sems kyang mngon par dang bar mdzad do //
analyzed: sems kyang mngon par dang bar mdzad do //
translated: He also purifies the mind.

original: yongs su dag pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What is the action of the purities?

original: bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He takes up birth in existence as he wishes.

original: bzhed nas bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs so //
analyzed: bzhed nas bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs so //
translated: If he wishes, he can remain for an eon or more than an eon.

original: tshe'i 'du byed kyang 'dor ro //
analyzed: tshe'i 'du byed kyang 'dor ro //
translated: He can also cast off the life faculty.

original: chos la dbang sgyur ro //
analyzed: chos la dbang sgyur ro //
translated: He has power over the Dharma.

original: ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ro //
translated: He has power over concentration.

original: dam pa'i chos kyang yang dag par 'dzin to //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang yang dag par 'dzin to //
translated: He upholds the true Dharma.

original: stobs rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What is the action of the powers?

original: rgyu med pa dang / mi mthun pa rgyur smra ba dang / ma byas pa dang / phrad par smra ba bsal nas yang dag par mngon par mtho ba'i las ston to //
analyzed: rgyu med pa dang / mi mthun pa rgyur smra ba dang / ma byas pa dang / phrad par smra ba bsal nas yang dag par mngon par mtho ba'i las ston to //
translated: Having eliminated the teaching of causeless origination, the teaching of an irregular cause, the teaching of non-action, and the teaching of contact, he teaches the action of true and manifest prosperity.

original: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / bshad pa'i snod dang ; bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dmigs pa dang / tshogs dang / 'os su 'gyur pa dang / nges par 'byung ba yang rjes su rtogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du nges par legs pa'i lam ston to //
analyzed: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / bshad pa'i snod dang ; bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dmigs pa dang / tshogs dang / 'os su 'gyur pa dang / nges par 'byung ba yang rjes su rtogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du nges par legs pa'i lam ston to //
translated: He also understands the mental behavior of sentient beings, their suitability as recipients of the teachings, their intentions, their latent propensities, their objects, their assemblies, their suitability, and their deliverance. Having understood these, he teaches the path of definite excellence in accordance with reality.

original: bdud thams cad kyang tshar gcod do //
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyang tshar gcod do //
translated: He also vanquishes all demons.

original: thams cad du dri ba dris pa yang lung ston to //
analyzed: thams cad du dri ba dris pa yang lung ston to //
translated: He also answers all questions.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What is the action of the four forms of intrepid confidence?

original: 'khor gyi nang du bdag ston pa yang dag pa yin par rnam par 'jog go //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du bdag ston pa yang dag pa yin par rnam par 'jog go //
translated: He establishes himself as the true teacher in the midst of the assembly.

original: rgol ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyang tshar gcod do //
analyzed: rgol ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyang tshar gcod do //
translated: He also vanquishes the adversaries, the non-Buddhists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What is the action of the four forms of mindfulness?

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas tshogs yongs su sdud do //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas tshogs yongs su sdud do //
translated: He attracts a following by being free from all forms of impurity.

original: bsrung ba med pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: bsrung ba med pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What is the action of the four forms of correct understanding?

original: rgyun mi 'chad par tshogs la 'doms so //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par tshogs la 'doms so //
translated: He constantly instructs the assembly.

original: yang dag par rjes su ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ston to //
translated: He constantly instructs and teaches the assembly.

original: bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What does he do by virtue of the nature of non-forgetfulness?

original: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mi 'dor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mi 'dor ro //
translated: He does not abandon the activities of a Buddha.

original: bag chags legs par bcom pas las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: bag chags legs par bcom pas las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What does he do by virtue of the destruction of the traces?

original: nyon mongs pa med pas nyon mongs pa lta bu'i spyod pa mi ston to //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pas nyon mongs pa lta bu'i spyod pa mi ston to //
translated: He does not manifest conduct like that of the afflicted, by virtue of the absence of affliction.

original: thugs rje chen pos las ci mdzad ce na /üîΩnyin mtshan lan drug tu 'jig @116a * //
analyzed: thugs rje chen pos las ci mdzad ce na / nyin mtshan lan drug tu 'jig @116a * //
translated: What does he do by virtue of great compassion?

original: rten la rnam par gzigs so //
analyzed: rten la rnam par gzigs so //
translated: He looks at the world six times each day and night.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What does he do by virtue of the special qualities of a Buddha?

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / 'thob pa dang / gshegs pa dang / bzhugs pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / 'thob pa dang / gshegs pa dang / bzhugs pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
translated: He surpasses all the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas by the purity of his deeds of body, speech and mind, by his attainment, his going and his dwelling.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis las ci mdzad ce na /
translated: What does he do by virtue of the knowledge of all the aspects?

original: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod do //
translated: He resolves the doubts of all sentient beings.

original: chos kyi tshul yang yun ring du 'jog go //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul yang yun ring du 'jog go //
translated: He establishes the Dharma method for a long time.

original: des sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams ni smin par mdzad do ;
analyzed: des sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams ni smin par mdzad do ;
translated: He brings to maturity those sentient beings who are not yet mature.

original: / yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar mdzad do //
analyzed: / yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar mdzad do //
translated: He liberates those who are already mature.

original: mngon par rtogs pa 'di dag la gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa'i lam thob na lam snga ma dman pa ni 'dor ro //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa 'di dag la gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa'i lam thob na lam snga ma dman pa ni 'dor ro //
translated: When he attains a superior path in these realizations, he abandons the former inferior path.

original: bsdoms te spong ba yang mngon sum du byed do //
analyzed: bsdoms te spong ba yang mngon sum du byed do //
translated: He also manifests the total abandonment of the latter.

original: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su nyan thos ni lam thams cad rgyun yang dag par gcod pa'i rnam par 'dor bas rnams par spong ste /
analyzed: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su nyan thos ni lam thams cad rgyun yang dag par gcod pa'i rnam par 'dor bas rnams par spong ste /
translated: The Sravaka abandons all paths by totally eliminating the continuum in the realm of nirvana without remainder.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no //
translated: But the Bodhisattva does not.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa dang / yon tan mi zad pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa dang / yon tan mi zad pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the Bodhisattvas are called those whose roots of virtue are inexhaustible and whose qualities are inexhaustible.

original: lung du mi ston pa'i dngos po gang dag rnam par gzhag pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: lung du mi ston pa'i dngos po gang dag rnam par gzhag pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are there neutral things?

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yongs su 'dri ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yongs su 'dri ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of improper questioning.

original: ci'i phyir tshul bzhin ma yin pa yongs su 'dri zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir tshul bzhin ma yin pa yongs su 'dri zhe na /
translated: Why is there improper questioning?

original: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la sems pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la sems pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the abandonment of reflection on cause and effect, on defilement and purification.

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs na /
translated: Why, when the bodhisattva has entered into the faultlessness of the bodhisattva,

original: rgyun tu zhugs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun tu zhugs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: does he not become a stream-winner?

original: rgyun la 'jug pa yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyun la 'jug pa yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the entry into the stream has not been completed.

original: ci'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why does he not become a once-returner?

original: bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he voluntarily takes up immeasurable rebirths.

original: ci'i phyir phyir mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir phyir mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why does he not become a non-returner?

original: bsam gtan rnams kyis gnas shing 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis gnas shing 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are born in the realm of desire while abiding in the meditative concentrations.

original: byang chub sems @116b dpa' rnams ni bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs par byas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems @116b dpa' rnams ni bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs par byas nas /
translated: The bodhisattvas, having realized the truths,

original: sa bcu rnams su bsgom pa'i lam la shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i lam sgom gyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sa bcu rnams su bsgom pa'i lam la shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i lam sgom gyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po ni ma yin te /
translated: cultivate the path that is the antidote to the obstacle to that which needs to be known on the path of cultivation in the ten stages, but not the antidote to the obstacle of the passions.

original: de byang chub thob pa na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa cig car spong ngo //
analyzed: de byang chub thob pa na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa cig car spong ngo //
translated: When they attain enlightenment, they simultaneously eliminate the obstacle of the passions and the obstacle to that which needs to be known.

original: cig car dgra bcom pa dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cig car dgra bcom pa dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They become simultaneously an arhat and a TathƒÅgata.

original: de nyon mongs pa ma spangs su zin kyang /
analyzed: de nyon mongs pa ma spangs su zin kyang /
translated: Even though they have not eliminated the passions,

original: sngags dang sman gyis song ba'i dug lta bu dang dper na spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa ltar sa thams cad du nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa mi skyed do ;
analyzed: sngags dang sman gyis song ba'i dug lta bu dang dper na spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa ltar sa thams cad du nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa mi skyed do ;
translated: like poison whose effect has been averted by a mantra or medicine, and like an arhat whose passions have been eliminated, they do not generate any faults of the passions on any of the stages.

original: / yang byang chub sems dpa' shes bya la mkhas pa dang / thams la mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: / yang byang chub sems dpa' shes bya la mkhas pa dang / thams la mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattva should be skilled in the knowable, skilled in all, skilled in unreal imagination, and skilled in non-imagination.

original: dus dus su dbang po rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dus dus su dbang po rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: From time to time, he should purify his faculties.

original: shes bya gang zhe na /
analyzed: shes bya gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowable?

original: de yang rnam pa drug tu blta ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa drug tu blta ste /
translated: It should be seen as sixfold:

original: 'khrul pa dang / 'khrul pa'i gnas dang / ma 'khrul pa'i gnas dang / 'khrul pa yang ma yin la ma 'khrul pa yang yin pa dang / ma 'khrul pa dang / na 'khrul pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang / 'khrul pa'i gnas dang / ma 'khrul pa'i gnas dang / 'khrul pa yang ma yin la ma 'khrul pa yang yin pa dang / ma 'khrul pa dang / na 'khrul pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
translated: error, the basis of error, the basis of non-error, neither error nor non-error, non-error, and the natural outcome of non-error.

original: thabs la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is skill in means?

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa dang / mngon par shes pa myur ba la mkhas pa dang / lam rgyun mi 'chad pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa dang / mngon par shes pa myur ba la mkhas pa dang / lam rgyun mi 'chad pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: It is skill in ripening beings, skill in perfecting the qualities of the Buddha, skill in swift super-knowledge, and skill in the uninterrupted path.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a false imagination?

original: rtsa ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mar 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mar snang ba 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mar 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mar snang ba 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
translated: It is the imagination of the root, the imagination of signs, the imagination of the appearance of signs, the imagination of the transformation of signs, the imagination of the appearance and transformation of signs, the imagination of what is taught by others,

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang / mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par g-yeng ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang / mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par g-yeng ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: the imagination of what is not correct, the imagination of what is correct, the imagination of attachment, and the imagination of distraction.

original: rnam par g-yeng ba'i rnam @117a * //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba'i rnam @117a * //
translated: What is the imagination of distraction?

original: par rtog pa yang dngos po med par rnam par rtog pa dang / dngos por rnam par rtog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gcig pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang /
analyzed: par rtog pa yang dngos po med par rnam par rtog pa dang / dngos por rnam par rtog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gcig pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang /
translated: Conceptualization also is conceptualization of non-entity, conceptualization of entity, conceptualization of superimposition, conceptualization of denial, conceptualization of identity,

original: tha dad pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang / khyad par du rnam par rtog pa dang / ming ji lta ba bzhin du don du rnam par rtog pa dang / don du ji lta ba bzhin du ming du rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang / khyad par du rnam par rtog pa dang / ming ji lta ba bzhin du don du rnam par rtog pa dang / don du ji lta ba bzhin du ming du rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: conceptualization of difference, conceptualization of intrinsic nature, conceptualization of specific properties, conceptualization of the meaning according to the name, and conceptualization of the name according to the meaning.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is non-conceptualization?

original: chog par 'dzin pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid de /
analyzed: chog par 'dzin pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid de /
translated: It is non-conceptualization of satisfaction, non-conceptualization of non-error, and non-conceptualization of non-elaboration.

original: so so'i skye bo rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / go rims bzhin no ;
analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / go rims bzhin no ;
translated: It is in the case of ordinary men, of the disciples, of the bodhisattvas, respectively.

original: / spros pa med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yid la byed pa med pas ma yin /
analyzed: / spros pa med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yid la byed pa med pas ma yin /
translated: The non-imagination of the unreal is not due to the absence of mental orientation in the absence of conceptual differentiation which is without conceptual differentiation.

original: yang dag par 'das pas ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par 'das pas ma yin /
translated: It is not due to the transcendence of the real.

original: rnam par zhi bas ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par zhi bas ma yin /
translated: It is not due to the pacification of the unreal.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin /
translated: It is not due to the essential nature.

original: dmigs pa las mngon par 'du byed pas ma yin par blta ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa las mngon par 'du byed pas ma yin par blta ste /
translated: It is not due to the absence of mental orientation in regard to the objective support.

original: 'on kyang dmigs pa la mngon par 'du byed pa med par blta'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang dmigs pa la mngon par 'du byed pa med par blta'o //
translated: But it is due to the absence of mental orientation in regard to the objective support.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dbang po rnon po yin na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dbang po rnon po yin na /
translated: If the bodhisattva is naturally one of sharp faculties,

original: ji ltar dbang po rnams sbyong zhe na /üîΩdbang po rnon po chung ngu la brten te rnon po 'bring mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po rnams sbyong zhe na / dbang po rnon po chung ngu la brten te rnon po 'bring mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: how does he purify his faculties?üîΩHe who is of sharp faculties, but of the lesser kind, achieves the middling kind of sharpness.

original: dbang po rnon po 'bring la brten te rnon po'i chen po mngon par bsgrub po //
analyzed: dbang po rnon po 'bring la brten te rnon po'i chen po mngon par bsgrub po //
translated: He who is of sharp faculties, but of the middling kind, achieves the greater kind of sharpness.

original: 'thob pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'thob pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the certainty of acquisition.

original: kun las btus pa bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: kun las btus pa bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourth Compendium.

original: // /'brel pa'i gtam gyis rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: // /'brel pa'i gtam gyis rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is certainty through connected discourse?

original: rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: rnam pa bdun te /
translated: It is sevenfold:

original: don rnam par nges pa dang / rnam par bshad pa rnam par nges pa dang / rab tu phye nas kun tu bstan pa rnam par nges pa dang / yang dag par dri ba rnam par nges pa dang / bsdu ba rnam par nges pa dang /
analyzed: don rnam par nges pa dang / rnam par bshad pa rnam par nges pa dang / rab tu phye nas kun tu bstan pa rnam par nges pa dang / yang dag par dri ba rnam par nges pa dang / bsdu ba rnam par nges pa dang /
translated: certainty of meaning, certainty of explanation, certainty of analysis, certainty of questioning, certainty of collection,

original: smra ba rnams par nges pa dang / ldem po rung dgongs pa rnam par nges pa'o //
analyzed: smra ba rnams par nges pa dang / ldem po rung dgongs pa rnam par nges pa'o //
translated: certainty of expression, and certainty of indirect speech.

original: don rnam par nges pa @117b gang zhe na /
analyzed: don rnam par nges pa @117b gang zhe na /
translated: What is certainty of meaning?

original: don drug las brtsams nas gang rnam par nges pa'o //
analyzed: don drug las brtsams nas gang rnam par nges pa'o //
translated: It is certainty with regard to the six meanings.

original: don drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: don drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six meanings?

original: ngo bo nyid kyi don dang / rgyu'i don dang / 'bras bu'i don dang / las kyi don dang / ldan pa'i don dang / 'jug pa'i don to //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi don dang / rgyu'i don dang / 'bras bu'i don dang / las kyi don dang / ldan pa'i don dang / 'jug pa'i don to //
translated: They are the meaning of intrinsic nature, the meaning of cause, the meaning of effect, the meaning of activity, the meaning of possession, and the meaning of manifestation.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi don ni ngo bo nyid gsum mo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi don ni ngo bo nyid gsum mo //
translated: The meaning of intrinsic nature is the three natures.

original: rgyu'i don ni skye ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i don ni skye ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The meaning of cause is the cause of birth, the cause of origination, and the cause of establishment.

original: 'bras bu'i don ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i don ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The meaning of effect is the effect of evolution, the effect of natural outcome, the effect of dominance, the effect of human action, and the effect of separation.

original: las kyi don ni dmigs pa'i las dang / byed pa'i las dang / 'bad pa'i las dang / sgyur ba'i las dang / 'thob pa'i las so //
analyzed: las kyi don ni dmigs pa'i las dang / byed pa'i las dang / 'bad pa'i las dang / sgyur ba'i las dang / 'thob pa'i las so //
translated: The meaning of action is the action of objective reference, the action of performance, the action of endeavor, the action of transformation, and the action of attainment.

original: ldan pa'i don ni mang po las gyur pa dang / rjes su 'ching ba las gyur pa dang / 'brel pa las gyur pa dang / gnas skabs las gyur pa dang / 'gyur ba las gyur pa'i ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa'i don ni mang po las gyur pa dang / rjes su 'ching ba las gyur pa dang / 'brel pa las gyur pa dang / gnas skabs las gyur pa dang / 'gyur ba las gyur pa'i ldan pa'o //
translated: The meaning of possession is possession as multiplicity, possession as continuity, possession as connection, possession as state, and possession as transformation.

original: 'jug pa'i don ni mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa dang / rten la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'jug pa dang / rab tu dbye ba'i 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i don ni mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa dang / rten la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'jug pa dang / rab tu dbye ba'i 'jug pa'o //
translated: The meaning of engagement is engagement by way of characteristic, engagement by way of basis, engagement by way of error, engagement by way of non-error, and engagement by way of differentiation.

original: rnam par bshad pa rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the Ascertainment of Explanation?

original: gang gis mdo sde rnams rnam par bshad par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis mdo sde rnams rnam par bshad par byed pa ste /
translated: It is that by which the Sutras are explained.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyu dang / yongs su shes pa dang / yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang / de rab tu shes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyu dang / yongs su shes pa dang / yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang / de rab tu shes pa'o //
translated: It is the thing to be fully understood, the meaning to be fully understood, the cause of full understanding, full understanding, the result of full understanding, and the full understanding of that.

original: yang rnam par bshad pa'i sgo bcu bzhi ste /
analyzed: yang rnam par bshad pa'i sgo bcu bzhi ste /
translated: Moreover, there are fourteen doors of explanation:

original: bcu bzhi ni rnam par bshad pa'i bsdu ba'i sgo dang / dngos po bsdu ba'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag gi sgo dang / gong nas gong du mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / spong ba'i sgo dang / yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba'i sgo dang /
analyzed: bcu bzhi ni rnam par bshad pa'i bsdu ba'i sgo dang / dngos po bsdu ba'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag gi sgo dang / gong nas gong du mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / spong ba'i sgo dang / yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba'i sgo dang /
translated: the door of the collection of explanations, the door of the collection of things, the door of the branches and sub-branches, the door of higher and higher accomplishment, the door of abandonment, the door of the transformation of letters, the door of the transformation of words, the door of the transformation of meanings, the door of the combination of words, the door of the combination of letters, the door of the combination of meanings, the door of the combination of the three, the door of the combination of the two, and the door of the combination of the single.

original: chud za ba dang chud mi za ba'i sgo dang / gang zag rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo dang / rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo @118a * //
analyzed: chud za ba dang chud mi za ba'i sgo dang / gang zag rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo dang / rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo @118a * //
translated: the door of loss and non-loss, the door of the establishment of the person, the door of the establishment of the classification, the door of the method,

original: dang ; yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i sgo dang / stobs dang stobs ma yin pa'i sgo dang / bzlos te brjod pa'i sgo dang / mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: dang ; yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i sgo dang / stobs dang stobs ma yin pa'i sgo dang / bzlos te brjod pa'i sgo dang / mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'o //
translated: the door of thorough cognition, etc., the door of strength and weakness, the door of repetition, and the door of realization.

original: rab tu phye nas kun tu bstan pa gtan la dbab pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rab tu phye nas kun tu bstan pa gtan la dbab pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the determination of the exposition of the analysis?

original: ji skad du bstan pa'i chos rnams la ci rigs su sbyar te /
analyzed: ji skad du bstan pa'i chos rnams la ci rigs su sbyar te /
translated: It is the application of the teachings as they are indicated,

original: gcig nas rtogs pa dang / tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba dang / tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba dang / mu gnyis pa dang / mu gsum pa dang / mu bzhi pa dang / de bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / spong ba'o //
analyzed: gcig nas rtogs pa dang / tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba dang / tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba dang / mu gnyis pa dang / mu gsum pa dang / mu bzhi pa dang / de bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / spong ba'o //
translated: in the manner of: understanding one, applying it to the next, applying it to the following, the two extremes, the three, the four alternatives, the affirmation, and the negation.

original: yang dag par 'dri ba rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag par 'dri ba rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the determination of the right questions?

original: rnam par brgyad de /
analyzed: rnam par brgyad de /
translated: It is eightfold:

original: ci zhes bstan pa yang dag par 'dri ba rnam par nges pa dang / ci zhes bstan pa la ji lta bar gang zhes bstan pa la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ci zhes bstan pa yang dag par 'dri ba rnam par nges pa dang / ci zhes bstan pa la ji lta bar gang zhes bstan pa la yang de bzhin no //
translated: The four kinds of certainty are certainty of the teaching, certainty of the meaning, certainty of the letters, and certainty of the reply to objections.

original: yang rnam par nges pa'i lam bzhi ste /
analyzed: yang rnam par nges pa'i lam bzhi ste /
translated: There are four kinds of certainty of the path:

original: sun 'byin par byed pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / gcod par byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin par byed pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / gcod par byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa'o //
translated: certainty of refutation, certainty of proof, certainty of elimination, and certainty of realization.

original: bsdu ba rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsdu ba rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is certainty of collection?

original: gnas bcus rnam par nges pa bsdus par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnas bcus rnam par nges pa bsdus par 'gyur te /
translated: Certainty is collected in ten topics.

original: gnas bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten topics?

original: bya ba bsgrub pa rnam par nges pa dang / 'jug pa rnam par nges pa dang / mos pa rnam par nges pa dang / rigs pas rnam par nges pas dang / 'phel ba'i gtam gyis rnam par nges pa dang / rab tu rtog pas rnam par nges pa dang /
analyzed: bya ba bsgrub pa rnam par nges pa dang / 'jug pa rnam par nges pa dang / mos pa rnam par nges pa dang / rigs pas rnam par nges pas dang / 'phel ba'i gtam gyis rnam par nges pa dang / rab tu rtog pas rnam par nges pa dang /
translated: Certainty of accomplishment of action, certainty of engagement, certainty of faith, certainty of reasoning, certainty of the discourse of increase, certainty of thorough investigation, certainty of the discourse of the universal vehicle, certainty of the discourse of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, certainty of the discourse of mixed character, and certainty of the discourse of the transitory composite.

original: rnam par dag pas rnam par nges pa dang / mngon par bsgrubs pas rnam par nges pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye bas rnam par nges pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa dang rtsol ba tsam gyis don thams cad bsgrub pa rnam par nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pas rnam par nges pa dang / mngon par bsgrubs pas rnam par nges pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye bas rnam par nges pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa dang rtsol ba tsam gyis don thams cad bsgrub pa rnam par nges pa'o //
translated: 1) definition by purification, 2) definition by accomplishment, 3) definition by the division of words, 4) definition by the spontaneous accomplishment of all aims by mere exertion.

original: smra ba rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: smra ba rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is definition of speech?

original: smra ba dang / smra ba'i zhal che ba dang / smra ba'i gzhi dang / smra ba'i rgyan dang / smra ba chad pas bcad pa dang / smra ba las 'byung ba dang / smra ba la gces spras byed pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: smra ba dang / smra ba'i zhal che ba dang / smra ba'i gzhi dang / smra ba'i rgyan dang / smra ba chad pas bcad pa dang / smra ba las 'byung ba dang / smra ba la gces spras byed pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is the speech, the great speech, the basis of speech, the ornament of speech, the punishment of speech, the origin of speech, and the essential point of speech.

original: smra ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: smra ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is speech?

original: smra ba dang / rmad khyer ba smra ba dang / rtsod pa smra ba dang / tshig ngan smra ba dang / mthun par smra ba dang / gdams pa smra ba'o //
analyzed: smra ba dang / rmad khyer ba smra ba dang / rtsod pa smra ba dang / tshig ngan smra ba dang / mthun par smra ba dang / gdams pa smra ba'o //
translated: It is the speech of the world, the speech of the Sages, the speech of the disputants, the speech of the vulgar, the speech of the wise, and the speech of the instructors.

original: smra ba ni tshig brjod pa thams cad do //
analyzed: smra ba ni tshig brjod pa thams cad do //
translated: Speech is all vocal sound.

original: @118b rmad khyer ba smra ba ni 'jig rten na grags pa'o //
analyzed: @118b rmad khyer ba smra ba ni 'jig rten na grags pa'o //
translated: The talk of the marvelous is what is well known in the world.

original: rtsod pa smra ba ni phan tshun mi mthun par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa smra ba ni phan tshun mi mthun par gnas pa'o //
translated: The talk of dispute is that which is held in mutual disagreement.

original: tshig ngan smra ba ni phan tshul tshig rlung pos nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tshig ngan smra ba ni phan tshul tshig rlung pos nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The talk of harshness is that which is held with mutual antagonism.

original: mthun par smra ba ni ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa dang mthun pa'i 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par nges pa'o ;
analyzed: mthun par smra ba ni ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa dang mthun pa'i 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par nges pa'o ;
translated: The talk of harmony is the talk of certainty which is in harmony with the pure vision of intuition.

original: / gdams pa smra ba ni sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa'o //
analyzed: / gdams pa smra ba ni sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa'o //
translated: The talk of instruction is the teaching for the sake of settling the mind in concentration when it is unsettled, and for the sake of liberating the mind when it is settled.

original: smra ba'i zhal che ba ni rgyal po bzhugs pa dang / bskos pa 'du ba'i sa dang / 'dus pa dang ; tshad mar rung ba'i zla grogs rnams dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze chos dang don la mkhas pa rnams so //
analyzed: smra ba'i zhal che ba ni rgyal po bzhugs pa dang / bskos pa 'du ba'i sa dang / 'dus pa dang ; tshad mar rung ba'i zla grogs rnams dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze chos dang don la mkhas pa rnams so //
translated: The talk of the assembly of orators is that of the king, the ministers, the assembly of the people, the assembly of the wise, and the assembly of the virtuous and the brahmins who are learned in the Dharma and its meaning.

original: smra ba'i gzhi ni bsgrub pa dang / sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: smra ba'i gzhi ni bsgrub pa dang / sgrub pa'o //
translated: The basis of talk is proof and establishment.

original: bsgrub pa ni ngo bo nyid dang khyad par ro //
analyzed: bsgrub pa ni ngo bo nyid dang khyad par ro //
translated: Proof is of two kinds: intrinsic and extrinsic.

original: sgrub pa ni dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug sdud pa dang / mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / yid ches pa'i lung ngo //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug sdud pa dang / mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / yid ches pa'i lung ngo //
translated: Proof is of six kinds: thesis, reason, example, application, conclusion, and the means of valid knowledge, perception and inference.

original: ngo bo nyid bsgrub pa ni bdag gi ngo bo nyid dang / chos kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid bsgrub pa ni bdag gi ngo bo nyid dang / chos kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Intrinsic proof is of two kinds: proof of the nature of a thing and proof of the attributes of a thing.

original: khyad par ni bdag gi khyad par dang / chos kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyad par ni bdag gi khyad par dang / chos kyi khyad par ro //
translated: Extrinsic proof is of two kinds: proof of the attributes of a thing and proof of the attributes of the attributes of a thing.

original: dam bca' ba ni bdag 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i don gzhan la go bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni bdag 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i don gzhan la go bar ston pa'o //
translated: A thesis is the statement of a proposition to be proved to another person.

original: gtan tshigs ni bsgrub pa de nyid la ma grags pa'i don yid ches par byed pa'i rgyu mngon sum du dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa bsnyad pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni bsgrub pa de nyid la ma grags pa'i don yid ches par byed pa'i rgyu mngon sum du dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa bsnyad pa'o //
translated: A reason is the statement of a cause that is accepted by both parties in a debate and that leads to the ascertainment of the proposition to be proved.

original: dpe ni mtha' mthong ba dang / mtha' ma mthong ba mtshungs par sbyar zhing bsnyad pa'o //
analyzed: dpe ni mtha' mthong ba dang / mtha' ma mthong ba mtshungs par sbyar zhing bsnyad pa'o //
translated: An example is the statement of a parallel case that is either well known or unknown.

original: nye bar sbyar ba ni de'i rigs kyi chos lhag ma de dang 'dra ba la de'i chos sbyar ba'i tshul gyis mthun par bsnyad pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar sbyar ba ni de'i rigs kyi chos lhag ma de dang 'dra ba la de'i chos sbyar ba'i tshul gyis mthun par bsnyad pa'o //
translated: Application is the method of applying the Dharma to the remaining phenomena of that type, in a way that is consistent with it.

original: mjug sdud pa ni mthar phyin par bsnyad pa'o //
analyzed: mjug sdud pa ni mthar phyin par bsnyad pa'o //
translated: Conclusion is the statement of the completion.

original: mngon sum ni rang gi don yod cing snang la ma nor ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum ni rang gi don yod cing snang la ma nor ba'o //
translated: Direct perception is the non-erroneous appearance and existence of one's own object.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum gyi lhag ma la yid ches pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum gyi lhag ma la yid ches pa'o //
translated: Inference is the conviction about the remainder of what is directly perceived.

original: yid ches pa'i lung ni de gnyi ga dang mi 'gal bar ston pa'o //üîΩsmra ba'i rgyan ni bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs shes pa dang / tshig @119a * //
analyzed: yid ches pa'i lung ni de gnyi ga dang mi 'gal bar ston pa'o // smra ba'i rgyan ni bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs shes pa dang / tshig @119a * //
translated: Authoritative scripture is the teaching that does not contradict either of those two.

original: zur phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / brtan pa dang / mthun par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zur phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / brtan pa dang / mthun par byed pa'o //
translated: The ornament of speech is the knowledge of one's own and others' systems, the perfection of well-turned phrases, fearlessness, firmness, and agreeableness.

original: smra ba chad pas gcad pa ni gtam rjes gcad pa dang / gtam 'phro lus dang / gtam gyi nyes pa'o //
analyzed: smra ba chad pas gcad pa ni gtam rjes gcad pa dang / gtam 'phro lus dang / gtam gyi nyes pa'o //
translated: The punishment for speech is the cutting off of conversation, the unfinished conversation, and the faults of conversation.

original: gtam rjes gcad pa ni rang gi smra ba'i skyon khas blang ba dang / gzhan gyi smra ba'i yon tan khas blang ba'o //
analyzed: gtam rjes gcad pa ni rang gi smra ba'i skyon khas blang ba dang / gzhan gyi smra ba'i yon tan khas blang ba'o //
translated: The cutting off of the conversation is the acknowledgment of one's own faults in speaking and the acknowledgment of the good qualities of the speech of others.

original: gtam 'phro lus pa ni 'di lta ste /üîΩgzhan nas gzhan du brgyud pa'am /
analyzed: gtam 'phro lus pa ni 'di lta ste / gzhan nas gzhan du brgyud pa'am /
translated: The unfinished conversation is as follows:üîΩ It is the wandering from one thing to another

original: gtam gzhan smra ba ste /
analyzed: gtam gzhan smra ba ste /
translated: or the speaking of something else

original: mdo sde las ji skad 'byung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: mdo sde las ji skad 'byung ba lta bu'o //
translated: as is found in the sutras.üîΩ The faults of conversation are: frivolous talk,üîΩ disorder,üîΩ unintelligibility,üîΩ unsuitability,

original: gtam gyi nyes pa ni cal col dang / 'khrugs pa dang / brda phrad du mi rung ba dang / ran pa ma yin pa dang / don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / dus tshigs ma yin par smra ba dang / mi brtan pa dang /
analyzed: gtam gyi nyes pa ni cal col dang / 'khrugs pa dang / brda phrad du mi rung ba dang / ran pa ma yin pa dang / don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / dus tshigs ma yin par smra ba dang / mi brtan pa dang /
translated: meaninglessness,üîΩ unseasonableness,üîΩ unsteadiness,üîΩ unclarity,

original: mi bsal ba dang / tshig rgyun chags pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi bsal ba dang / tshig rgyun chags pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: and lack of continuity of speech.

original: smra ba las 'byung ba ni phyir rgol ba snod ma yin pa dang / 'khor yon tan med pa dang / bdag kyang mi mkhas par rig nas smra bar mi bya ba dang / phyir rgol ba snod du gyur ba zhig gam /
analyzed: smra ba las 'byung ba ni phyir rgol ba snod ma yin pa dang / 'khor yon tan med pa dang / bdag kyang mi mkhas par rig nas smra bar mi bya ba dang / phyir rgol ba snod du gyur ba zhig gam /
translated: The origin of speech is the non-speaking of the Dharma when one knows that the opponent is an unfit vessel, that the assembly is devoid of good qualities, or that one is not learned oneself;

original: 'khor yon tan dang ldan nam /
analyzed: 'khor yon tan dang ldan nam /
translated: Is the assembly endowed with good qualities?

original: bdag kyang mkhas par rig nas smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang mkhas par rig nas smra bar bya'o //
translated: And, knowing that I am learned, I will speak.

original: smra ba la gces spras byed pa'i chos rnams ni bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs la mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: smra ba la gces spras byed pa'i chos rnams ni bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs la mkhas pa ste /
translated: The qualities that are cherished in speaking are being learned in one's own and others' scriptures.

original: des thams cad du smra bar byed do //
analyzed: des thams cad du smra bar byed do //
translated: By them one speaks everywhere.

original: mi 'jigs pa ni gang gis 'khor thams cad du smra bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa ni gang gis 'khor thams cad du smra bar byed pa'o //
translated: Fearlessness is that by which one speaks everywhere in the assembly.

original: spobs pa ni gang gis thams cad du lan gdab pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa ni gang gis thams cad du lan gdab pa shes pa'o //
translated: Eloquence is that by which one knows how to answer everywhere.

original: yang dag legs su 'dod pas smra ba'i tshul shes par bya'i brtsad cing smra bar ni mi bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag legs su 'dod pas smra ba'i tshul shes par bya'i brtsad cing smra bar ni mi bya ste /

analyzed: phyogs ngan pa yongs su 'dzin cing mngon par zhen pa'i nyes pa dang / ngan g-yo smra ba'i nyes pa dang / dus ma yin par gtam la sbyor ba'i nyes pa dang / gtam khyad du gsod pa'i nyes pa dang / tshig brlang po'i nyes pa dang /
translated: The faults of holding and clinging to bad views, the faults of speaking deceitfully, the faults of speaking at the wrong time, the faults of speaking in a way that is contemptuous, the faults of speaking harshly,üîΩthe faults of speaking in a way that is disturbing, and the faults of speaking in a way that is not beneficial.

translated: The faults of speaking in a way that is not beneficial are sixfold: speaking in a way that is not beneficial, speaking in a way that is not timely, speaking in a way that is not truthful, speaking in a way that is not gentle, speaking in a way that is not loving, and speaking in a way that is not meaningful.

original: rgyal ba'am pham pa'i sems med par smra ba dkon pa dang / rgyal ba'am pham yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dkon pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa reg par gnas pa dkon pa dang / reg par mi gnas pa dge ba'i chos rnams la rgyun du bsgom pa dkon pa dang /
